page.title: 19Entertainment and Sport.
page.content: Most local events are held at Eastnor Castle or Bromesberrow Place. There are several traditional annual events, these include School and Church fetes, a Carol Party, held at Bromesberrow Place, and the Harvest Suppers. The Forestry Commission hold regular meetings on the Estates. The Village Halls in Bromesberrow and Eastnor are also used for various events such as whist drives, meetings and dances. Charity and fund raising functions are held regularly at Eastnor Castle. Eastnor has a cricket team, a bowling green and a sports' ground, but although there is a sports' ground by the Village Hall in Bromesberrow there have been no local teams for several years.
